moves.2... g6: This is a TERRIBLE defense against the Patzer, as QxPe5+ gives white Rh8.
moves.5. e5: That isn't much of a defense.
moves.5... Qxe5+ 6. Be2 b6 7. g3 Ba6: White must watch out for QxBe2#.  We don't want this game to end too quickly.  Pd3 will protect the bishop at Pe2, while letting white's black bishop access to the field.
moves.8. f4: Wrong pawn.  If black moves Bb7, white's rook is at risk.
moves.8... Qe4: Even better.  Ng1 is the only thing protecting Be2 from QxBe2#.  White's rook is lost.
